data.text:
Hotel is situated in the Poblenou area of Barcelona which is a quieter district.  You are a street away from numerous bars, restaurants, shops and cafes.  The beach ‘Bogatell’ is less than 10 minutes walk, through a park area and is a large stretch of sand.  It is clean and has a few beach bars.  There is a metro station 5 minutes away from the hotel and from there you can easily get to all the main tourist attractions that Barcelona has to offer.

The hotel is clean and modern.  The rooms have a very comfortable bed, plenty of hanging and drawer space and the shower is hot and powerful.  There is also a hairdryer, shampoo and shower gel if you are travelling light.  There is no kettle (we took a travel one) and no fridge but as we spent very little time in the room this wasn’t an issue.  The basement bar was excellent and reasonably priced.  Breakfast was also very good with a huge selection of hot and cold food and drink. 

The pool on the roof looked wonderful however as the weather wasn’t quite warm enough we didn’t try it out but the view from the roof was amazing.  It was a shame the bar on the rooftop wasn’t yet open but am sure in the summer this is a great place to sit, swim and relax.
We loved Barcelona and enjoyed our stay at Hotel Voraport.
data.title: Modern clean and brilliant hotel

data.text: Great hotel in a great location right near the beach and a Metro station for easy access to the beautiful city. Great breakfast and great sun deck on the roof which was really chilled. Hotel was very clean and tidy and staff were very helpful and friendly
data.title: Great Hotel

data.text: We loved this hotel as it was really clean and tidy and the breakfast and roof top sun terrace with pool was great. The staff were very friendly and it is in a great location close to the beach and a great street of bars, restaurants and shops to use. Highly recommend this to everyone
data.title: Superb Hotel

data.text: Absolutely amazing hotel… The stuff is so nice and polite, roof pool and terrace is amaizing with beautiful view, rooms are perfectly clean every day. Location is great, 5 minutes from beach, 2 minutes from metro ( you are in the center of the city in 5 minutes). I will come back for sure
data.title: Great stay in Barcelona

data.text:
We stayed here as a couple as part of a package deal. 

On arrival (a €35 taxi ride form airport) we were early (around midday) and just expected to be able to drop our cases and come back to check in, but the reception  got us into a room right away, impressed from the get go. 

All staff very amenable, with lots of different nationalities in the hotel English was the common ground and we never struggled to communicate. 

Breakfast absolutely fine, really good continental selection with a small cooked section. Never struggled to get seated even at busier times.

Rooms appear recently done. Given Barcelona is currently in a drought you would not know it. Excellent water pressure and great shower with nice soaps etc in room. Beds very comfortable and room very clean with nice views from upper floors. Hardly heard any other rooms or people so must be good soundproofing. 

Around a 5 minute walk to the nearest metro station where you can connect into the centre really easily. Also about a 10 min walk to the beach which has a really nice stretch nearby. Nice pool area and terrace  on the roof with good views, water not heated but once you're in it's fine.

All in all a fantastic hotel and we would not hesitate to come back here if we wanted to come back to Barcelona.
data.title: Great Base to Explore Barcleona

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Joe,

Thank you so much for sharing your experience with us! 

It's wonderful to know that our reception team was able to accommodate you with an early check-in, we strive to provide excellent service to all our guests from the first contact, it’s a pleasure to hear that our staff, representing various nationalities, made communication easy for you.

We're delighted that you found our breakfast selection to your liking, and that you were able to enjoy it without any issues, even during busier times. Additionally, we're pleased that you found our recently renovated rooms comfortable and clean, with excellent amenities and beautiful views.

Thank you for highlighting our convenient location, just a short walk from the metro station and the beach. We're glad you were able to take advantage of our pool area and rooftop terrace, despite the water not being heated.

It's truly rewarding to hear that you had a fantastic experience overall, and we would be honored to welcome you back to Barcelona and our hotel in the future. If you ever decide to return, please don't hesitate contact us. Safe travels!

Irma Yáñez
Guest Experience Manager
